title: (x) pixel font on wwww.kpf.com - copy 08\_55 {Russ Yusupov}
content:
does anyone know the name of the pixel font in the attached image? found on [www.kpf.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20090807111144/http:/www.kpf.com/ "www.kpf.com")  
thx!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [fontID2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090807111144/http:/typophile.com/files/fontID2.jpg) | 74.72 KB |
author: workday

comments.content:
Dear Workday,

I am (and so are most) horrible at trying to figure out pixel fonts. They just don’t hold a candle to beautifully styled fonts.

In all my years of helping ID fonts - when it comes to pixel fonts I offer two suggestions. And hope your eyes are young enough to go through to find what you are looking for.

Commercial Pixel Fonts  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=pixel](http://web.archive.org/web/20090807111144/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=pixel "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=pixel")

Shareware/Freeware/Charityware/Beerware  
 [http://www.dafont.com/bitmap.php?page=1&nb\_ppp\_old=10&text=Type+your+tex...](http://web.archive.org/web/20090807111144/http:/www.dafont.com/bitmap.php?page=1&nb_ppp_old=10&text=Type+your+text+here&nb_ppp=50&af=on&classt=pop "http://www.dafont.com/bitmap.php?page=1&nb\_ppp\_old=10&text=Type+your+text+here&nb\_ppp=50&af=on&classt=pop")

Sorry I cannot be more helpful than that - but hopefully your font is among the many growing pixel fonts that are out there...

found it after a bit of research.

[http://www.miniml.com/fonts/font/copy\_08\_55/index.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20090807111144/http:/www.miniml.com/fonts/font/copy_08_55/index.htm "http://www.miniml.com/fonts/font/copy\_08\_55/index.htm")
